title: Order & Chaos Online v1.2.2  CRACKED - ARMANI
description:
Requirements: Android 2.2+
Overview: The only true real-time, full-3D MMORPG on Android: Join thousands of payers.


Order and Chaos Online is the only true real-time, full-3D MMORPG on Android: Join thousands of players.

Finally a true real-time, full-3D MMORPG comes to the Android: Explore a vast heroic fantasy world and join thousands of players in this massively multiplayer online experience that pushes the boundaries of epic!

Use the advanced character creation system to customize your hero:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create up to 4 different characters to play.

INTERACT WITH THE COMMUNITY
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make friends or enemies, trade, duel, communicate and more: a wide range of interactions makes each player a living part of this universe.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Join a party or guild to become stronger and coordinate with your teammates, or you can choose to adventure solo, interacting with other players peacefully or otherwise...

THE WORLD IS YOURS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Travel through the most majestic settings - from dark forests to deserts, jungles, mountains and more - on foot or by magical means.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Talk and interact with hundreds of characters to find over 500 quests to perform.
Be ready for some action with the famous iPhone game finally released for Android players. Fight many enemies and be ready to join & compete with iOS players in an upcoming update.

Enter the legend now!

What's in this version:
There was an issue with the previous version which was causing a crash for some users.
This new version addresses that. Apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused.
A big update for Order & Chaos Online is now available!
